title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The current code in the BidiUtil class in the win32 version of org.eclipse.swt.internal package uses Class.forName() to create a new Callback. However, this causes a NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT, as the CLDC class libraries do not include this error class. The problem only occurs when using jxeLink or a similar tool, as the compiler assumes that the NoClassDefFoundError class is available. This bug report requests a modification to the code to remove the reflection and fix the issue.
